p: United States of America Third Judicial Dist of Wash Terry } SS
To the Marshal of the Dist of Wash Terry

Whereas in behalf of the United States has made complaint on oath to me the undersigned a commission affidavited by the Supreme Court of the Terry of Washington, for the third Judicial Dist. of said Terry to take acknowledgement of bail and affidavits and also to take deposition of Witnesses in civil cases charging the

did on or about the 20" day of Feb AD 1888 at Port Townsend Jefferson County and Terry of Washington did unlawfully Enter the territory of the United States she having then and there a citizen of the Empire of China and prohibited from Entering the Terrytory of the United States by act of conpess known as the Chinese restructiers act and having contrary against the
the peace and dignity of the United States and contrary to the Statute in such case made and provided

Now therefore you are hereby commanded in the name of the United States of America to apprehend the said N Gan Oi and bring her body forthwith before me or before some other proper officer authorized by law to arrest imprison and bail for crimes and offences against the United States wherein found in your district that she may then and there be dealt with according to law for said offence and have you then and there this writ
Given under my hand and seal this 20h day of Feby AD 1888
Service warrant Transp. self and prisoner Pt. Townsend to Seattle W.T. 50 units at 10 cts
